All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Represents an adaptation action to be performed at a specific point in simulation time.
BalancedTreeTopologyStrategy
A TopologyStrategy which links the mirrors of the Network as a balanced tree with a single root Mirror.
DataPackage
Represents a single data package to be held by mirrors.
Effect
Represents the effect of an adaptation action.
Effector
An effector for the RDM network.
ExampleOptimizer
 
ExampleSimulation
Simple simulation runner.
FullyConnectedTopology
A TopologyStrategy which links each Mirror of the Network with each other mirror.
GraphVisualization
Graphical visualisation of the simulator using the GraphStream library.
IDGenerator
Simple ID generator, which will provide increasing numbers as ID.
Link
A link between two mirrors.
Link.State
 
LinkProbe
A probe observing links.
Mirror
A single mirror in an RDM network.
Mirror.State
 
MirrorChange
An adaptation action representing the change of the number of mirrors.
MirrorProbe
A probe to observe mirrors in an RDM network.
NConnectedTopology
A TopologyStrategy which connects each mirror with exactly n other mirrors.
Network
An RDM Network.
Probe
A Probe to observer an RDM Network.
ScenarioOne
 
TargetLinkChange
An adaptation action representing the change of the number of links per mirror.
TimedRDMSim
Latency-aware simulator for remote data mirroring (Latency-aware RDM).
TopologyChange
An adaptation action representing the change of the topology.
TopologyStrategy
Interface to be used by all Topology strategies.
VisualizationStrategy
Interface for visualization strategies for the simulator.
